page.title: 16A DAY IN THE LIFE ...
page.content: A DAY IN THE LIFE OF VERONICA ORDINARY. 7.00AM.SHE IS ASLEEP.7.30AM.SHE WAKES UP.8.00.GETS DRESSED.8.30AM.EATS BREAKFAST AND THEN GOES TO SCHOOL9.00AM SHE WENT INTO SCHOOL AND HAD ASSEMBLY.9.30AM SHE WAS DOING MATHS.10.00AM SHE WAS DOING RECORDERS. 10.30AM SHE WENT OUT TO PLAY IN THE PLAYGROUND.11.00AM SHE WENT TO DO ENGLISH.11.00AM SHE WAS DOING MUSIC.12.00PM SHE WAS HAVING DINNER.12.30PM SHE WENT OUT TO PLAY.1.15 VERONICA CAME IN FROM PLAY TIME.1.30PM SHE WAS WRITING POEMS.2.00.SHE WAS WRITING STORYS.2.30PM SHE WENT OUT TO PLAY.2.45 SHE CAME IN FROM PLAYTIME.3.30 SHE WENT HOME FROM SCHOOL.4.00 SHE WAS AT FRIENDS HOUSE.4.30PM STILL PLAYING AT FRIENDS HOUSE.Q
